title.zh: 关于主页项目的技术点
title.en: About the main technical points of the homepage project

description.en: The main technical points of the homepage project are introduced in detail, including the use of Next.js, the use of MDX, the use of Tailwind and so on
description.zh: 主要介绍了主页项目的技术点，包括使用 Next.js，使用 MDX，使用 Tailwind 等等
为了完成 Cpp 的的课程设计，需要一个好用的构建工具。接触了 Google 的 Bazel 后，决定学习一下。
description.en: To complete the course design of Cpp, a good build tool is needed. After I encountered Google's Bazel, I decided to learn it.
I had my first interview for Dingtalk on 2024-05-27, this is a summary of the interview
description.zh: 在2024-05-27我参加了钉钉的第一次面试，这是面试总结

title.en: FastGPT: Building an English Essay Correction Robot
title.zh: FastGPT: 搭建一个英语作文纠错机器人

description.en: This Blog introduces how to use FastGPT to build an English essay correction robot via a workflow.
description.zh: 本文通过搭建一个英语作文纠错机器人，介绍一下如何使用FastGPT的工作流

description.en: Why I migrate from Obsidian to Notion, and the future
description.zh: 为什么从 Obsidian 迁移到 Notion, 以及未来

title.en: Use Gitea to build up a personal git server and CI/CD
title.zh: 使用 Gitea 搭建私有 Git 服务器和 CI/CD

description.zh: 为了编辑博客时不需要在本地进行编译，也为了方便部署，使用 Gitea 搭建私有的 Git 服务器和 CI/CD。这样就可以专注于博客内容
description.en: As for editing blog without compiling locally and deploying conveniently, I use Gitea to build up a personal git server and CI/CD. In this way, I can focus on the content of the blog.

title.zh: n1盒子安装docker，docker中安装openwrt，openwrt配置旁路由
title.en: Install docker on n1 box, install openwrt in docker, and configure bypass route in openwrt

description.zh: 去年买了个n1盒子，这篇文章记录了如何在n1盒子上安装docker，然后在docker中安装openwrt，最后在openwrt中配置旁路由。
description.en: I bought an n1 box last year. This article records how to install docker on the n1 box, then install openwrt in docker, and finally configure the bypass route in openwrt.

title.zh: I18n: 从代码中查询中文

description.en: This article shows how to query Chinese in code.
description.zh: 本文展示了如何在代码中查询中文。

title.zh: 在 PixelBook 安装声卡驱动

description.en: Setup audio driver on Pixelbook running any linux distribute

title.en: Custom Symbol for aerial.nvim with Tree-sitter Query
title.zh: 使用 Tree-sitter Query 为 aerial.nvim 添加自定义 symbol

description.zh: 在使用 aerial.nvim 的时候发现某些 symbol 没有被识别。需要自定义 symbol。本文将简要介绍如何使用 Tree-sitter 的 Query 为 aerial 提供自定义的 Symbol
description.en: When using aerial.nvim, I found that some symbols were not recognized. Custom symbols are needed. This article will briefly introduce how to use Tree-sitter Query to provide custom symbols for aerial

title.zh: Niri，一个可滚动平铺的 Wayland 组合器。

description.en: This is a blog about Niri, a scrollable-tiling Wayland compositor.
description.zh: 这是一篇关于 Niri 的博客，一个可滚动平铺的 Wayland 组合器。
